channel.title: Someone help me run mopar on my computer!
channel.description:
I cannot run MoparScape on my computer! I go to 'moparisthebest.com' and agree to the terms or whatever, and it takes me to the page, but it just shows a big gary bow (w/ ads all around it)! I have already downloaded Mopar Client 3.2 w/ Aryan, but it won't run! Just a big ol' gray annoying box. Someone plz tell me what I have to download or [b][i][u]WHATEVER![/u][/i][/b] :confused: :confused: :confused:
also: this shows up in a box:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/StringBuild er at Bot.<clinit>(Bot.java:107) Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Someone help me run mopar on my computer!
item.dc:creator: @def_leppard def leppard
item.description:
@def_leppard wrote:

nno no no
all wrong goto http//:java.sun.com and goto downloads hit the java SE and download the one that has jre (java runtime enviourment) and SAVE it in its OWN files in your file folder otherwise know as explore. and then run from the .bat file orif you have a mac i think the linux file and then it should work!!

Read full topic
item.source: Someone help me run mopar on my computer!

Your java didn’t install, try again installing the JDK but when you isntall tick every option
